pre_caption: This is a scenic, tilt-shift video capturing a view of the Grand Canal in Venice. The shot looks down the waterway, flanked by historic buildings, with the focus on the bustling boat traffic. Various boats, including gondolas and water taxis, can be seen moving along the green-tinted water.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
